name: Amanda
description: a large black woman with a loud laugh.

51: "Hello, hello!" she cries, clapping her hands together.*
133: "You're here again! Good." She smiles widely. "What can I get ya?"
179: "Amanda, but you can call me 'Miss Mandy'."
"He's been in here a few times. He has a homesick look, he does."
"Remember to tell your friends 'bout Miss Mandy."
"That's one on me. 'Tain't never heard o' that."
967: "Come back when you have some gold."

1687: "That'll put some meat on your bones."
